original_text: Now Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters. And the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
korean_text: 헤벨의 아들 슬로브핫은 아들이 없고 딸뿐이라 그 딸의 이름은 말라와 노아와 호글라와 밀가와 디르사니

sentences.original_text: Now Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons
sentences.korean_translation: 때에 헤벨의 아들 슬로핫은 아들이 없었으나

sentences.original_text: And the names of the daughters of Zelophehad
were Mahlah, Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
